titleStmt.title: Money Account
titleStmt.author: Unknown scribe, working for the komogrammateus Petaus

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Account of expenses:;for the service to the thieves <read probably: thief-catchers>: 10 <drachmai>;for a papyrus roll to cut: 2 drachmai;for fodder, for 3 camels: 7 <drachmai> 16 obols;for ink: 2 <drachmai> 6 obols;to the assistant: 2 <drachmai>;to the beneficiarius: 15 <drachmai>;for garlands and pine-cones: 4 <drachmai>;to the carpenter: 20 <drachmai>;to the door-keeper: 2 <drachmai>;to Harpokration the carrier: 12 <drachmai>;to Hermenios: 12 <drachmai>;<to those> in the fields(?): 15 <drachmai>;to the assistant: 2 <drachmai>;to the (messenger) going to the epistrategos: 15 <drachmai>;for a bench: 2 drachmai;<to the messenger going> to the court of the prefect: [*]20 drachmai;to Harpalos: 9 <drachmai>;to the assistants who are with Heras: 3 <drachmai>;to the president: 25 <drachmai>;to those (who manage) the unsold properties: 7[*] <drachmai>;to Anoubion: 50 <drachmai>;to the clerk: 40 <drachmai>;to the lawyers: 40 <drachmai>;for the slaves: 35 <drachmai>;for the slaves of the royal <scribe>: 2 <drachmai>

listBibl.bibl: Hagedorn U - Hagedorn D - Youtie LC - Youtie HC, PPetaus, 34, 1969
